main.name: Hasan Aldhahi
main.description: Aspiring Data Scientist with a focus on Deep Learning and High-Performance Data Analytics
main.bio: Hi there! I am Hasan, a Master’s student in Applied Data Science at the University of Göttingen. My current focus is on Deep Learning for Computer Vision, Advanced Statistical Inference, and High-Performance Data Analytics. I am passionate about building innovative solutions using AI and have experience as a Full Stack Developer working with React, Python, and more. My journey has taken me across multiple countries, enriching my skills in software development, machine learning, and leadership.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to discuss exciting opportunities!

education.description: Focus on Deep Learning for Computer Vision, Advanced Statistical Inference, Linear Models, and High-Performance Data Analytics.
Built a cooking website as a capstone project, mastering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Git.
Focused on Machine Learning, AI, Computer Networks, Digital and Analog Circuit Design, and Power Electronics.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Developed a dashboard plugin tool using PHP and JavaScript for the university's website (Stud-IP), displaying statistical data and measuring students' performance.

work.title: eXplainable AI Frontend Developer
work.description: Developed the frontend of Web App CLARUS for modeling protein-to-protein interaction using React JS, Pytorch, and Cytoscape JS.

work.title: Technology Engineer Intern
work.description: Prepared an Engineering Manual for selecting Active Harmonic Filters to maintain IEEE power quality standards in buildings.

work.title: Hardware Engineer Intern
work.description: Developed a stylus pen using Arduino and C programming to acquire data using a mouse sensor, accelerometer, and gyroscope.

projects.title: Reinforcement Learning Thesis
projects.description: Tested a thesis on the impact of complex environments on agent training using DQN and DDQN algorithms on Lunar Lander v.2. env with Pytorch and Stable Baseline.

projects.title: Web App for Connecting Customers with Chefs
projects.description: Built using Next.js, React, HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.title: P2P Query Program
projects.description: Utilized socket programming for efficient query transmission without overloading nodes, built with Python.

projects.title: Visitor Tracking System with Facial Recognition
projects.description: Achieved 89% accuracy in facial recognition to automate door access using Raspberry Pi, OpenCV, Google Firebase, and Arduino.

testimonials.text: Hasan's dedication to solving complex problems with innovative solutions is remarkable.
A brilliant developer with exceptional problem-solving skills and a passion for learning.
